search.query: `wineventlog_security` EventCode IN (4722, 4725, 4720, 4726) user!=*$$ | table _time, host, user, name, EventCode | rename subject as Action

panel.title: AD - User Previlege Escalation (Member added/removed to/from a group)

search.query: `wineventlog_security` EventCode IN (4728, 4729) | rename name as change_action | table host, change_action, Group_Name, member_id

panel.title: AD - Password change outside working hour

search.query: `wineventlog_security` EventCode IN (627, 628, 4723, 4724, 4794) | eval date_wday = strftime(_time, "%A"), date_hour = tonumber(strftime(_time, "%H")) | where date_wday="Saturday" OR date_wday="Sunday" OR date_hour<6 OR date_hour>19 | table _time, user, host, Account_Domain, Account_Name, msad_action, action, Password_Last_Set, EventCode, EventCodeDescription
